title: Failed to set Azure subscription context
expected: Should be able to set subscription context
details: Attempted to set Azure subscription context for ACR health check. Command: 'az account set --subscription test-sub'. This failure prevents accessing Azure Resource Health API for ACR 'test' in resource group 'test-rg'. Common causes: invalid subscription ID, insufficient permissions, or Azure CLI not authenticated.
next_steps: Verify subscription ID `test-sub` and Azure authentication for resource group `test-rg`
